title.u: How to sum up using the calculator

shortdesc.i: here you will find instruction about sum up feature of JPS calculator app.

li.i: Ensure you have accurate information on your monthly income and expenses.
Have a calculator application installed and ready to use on your device.

ol.li: Allocate some uninterrupted time to complete the task effectively.

p.i: Create a monthly budget plan by calculating your income, expenses, and savings using a calculator application.

cmd.i: Add up all the sources of income you receivemonthly,such as salary,freelancing earning and rential income.
Enter the individual amount into thecalculator and press"+" button after each entry.
Once you have entered all the incoming amounts,press"=" button to get the total of monthly income.

result.i: the result from the sum up is displayed.

li.i: Enter the first income amount, which is the salary of $2,500.
Enter the second income amount, which is the freelance earnings of $800.
Enter the third income amount, which is the rental income of $600.

p.i: Result: The calculator application will display the total monthly income, which in this case is $3,900. Therefore, the total monthly income from salary, freelance earnings, and rental income is $3,900.
